00032 /* =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00033  *   BSP (Board Support Package)
00034  *   Target : Texas Instruments EZ430-RF2500
00035  *            "MSP430 Wireless Development Tool"
00036  *   LED definition file.
00037  * =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00038  */
00039 
00040 #ifndef BSP_LED_DEFS_H
00041 #define BSP_LED_DEFS_H
00042 
00043 
00044 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045  *                                           Includes
00046  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047  */
00048 #include "bsp_board_defs.h"
00049 
00050 
00051 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052  *                                         Configuration
00053  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054  */
00055 #define __bsp_NUM_LEDS__               2
00056 #define __bsp_LED_BLINK_LOOP_COUNT__   0x34000  /* TBD : incorporate clock from bsp_board_defs.h */
00057 
00058 
00059 /* ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00060  *                 LED #1
00061  * ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00062  *   Schematic :  D2
00063  *   Color     :  Green
00064  *   Polarity  :  Active High
00065  *   GPIO      :  P1.1
00066  * ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00067  */
00068 #define __bsp_LED1_BIT__            1
00069 #define __bsp_LED1_PORT__           P1OUT
00070 #define __bsp_LED1_DDR__            P1DIR
00071 #define __bsp_LED1_IS_ACTIVE_LOW__  0
00072 
00073 
00074 /* ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00075  *                 LED #2
00076  * ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00077  *   Schematic :  D1
00078  *   Color     :  Red
00079  *   Polarity  :  Active High
00080  *   GPIO      :  P1.0
00081  * ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00082  */
00083 #define __bsp_LED2_BIT__            0
00084 #define __bsp_LED2_PORT__           P1OUT
00085 #define __bsp_LED2_DDR__            P1DIR
00086 #define __bsp_LED2_IS_ACTIVE_LOW__  0
00087 
00088 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089  *                                 Include Generic LED Macros
00090  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091  */
00092 #include "code/bsp_generic_leds.h"
00093 
00094 
00095 /**************************************************************************************************
00096  */
00097 #endif
